short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To create website simple as possible, new modern look

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The thematic thrust of this extension I created is pretty simple. 
This website, Tube plus, is one of my favourite free movie and drama site, and I always consider there are so many advertising and unimportant information that I am not even looking it at all. 
So I would like to change it to look as clean and simple as possible. While I work on giving it a modern look, i was struggling with organizing images side by side because my lack of coding skill since i am a begginer. Therefore I tried to make the website has no advertising messed up and  just remain prime informations.
